about_the_game:
Water... Land... Sky...
Do you have what it takes to defeat nature's All Terrain Vehicle?
Many have tried, none have succeeded. Will you be the one to do it?

Race Against a Duck: Duck Deluxe pits you against a duck in a water, land, and sky race. You'll need to upgrade your vehicle to keep up, though. Have ducks always been this fast...?

Enjoy arcade game-play, meta-progression, and story twists as you work your way towards this finish line, racing against a duck!

Originally created for the BIGMODE game jam, Race Against a Duck: Duck Deluxe is an expanded release! More modes, more story, more upgrades, and more ducks await!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mountain Lion 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan compatible
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mountain Lion 10.11 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 500 series / ATI Radeon HD 6000 series or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Race Against a Duck: Duck Deluxe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIndows 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel Celeron / Athlon Sempron
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan compatible
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WIndows 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / Athlon FX series or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 500 series / ATI Radeon HD 6000 series or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: "Water... Land... Sky... Do you have what it takes to defeat nature's All Terrain Vehicle?" Upgraded with new modes, improvements, and story content from the original web version!
